mapper.select: SELECT NT_NO , NT_TITLE , NT_CONTENT , NT_HIT , TO_CHAR(NT_REG_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS NT_REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(NT_MOD_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS NT_MOD_DATE , NT_DEL_YN , EMP_NAME AS NT_WRITER FROM NOTICE , EMPLOYEE WHERE NT_DEL_YN = 'N' AND NT_WRITER = EMP_NO order by nt_no desc
mapper.insert:
select seq_notice.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO notice ( nt_no, nt_title, nt_writer, nt_content, nt_hit, nt_reg_date, nt_mod_date, nt_del_yn ) VALUES ( #{nt_no}, #{nt_title}, #{nt_writer}, #{nt_content}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NT_HIT = NT_HIT + 1 WHERE NT_NO = #{NT_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT NT_NO , NT_TITLE , NT_WRITER , NT_CONTENT , NT_HIT , TO_CHAR(NT_REG_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS NT_REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(NT_MOD_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS NT_MOD_DATE , NT_DEL_YN FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_NO = #{NT_NO}
